column1: 8 pts - You identified a business function that could benefit from scrum/sprint methodologies, but the explanation could be more specific. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good effort in explaining the scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies for different business functions. Keep working on providing more specific details and examples.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why kanban may not be the best fit for certain functions, but it could be more specific and clear in some areas. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - You have clearly identified the business functions that could benefit from implementing kanban methodologies, specifically Production, Distribution, and Marketing. Great job!

Rating: 8 pts

Comment: Good attempt at explaining how kanban could operate for the chosen functions, but some explanations were unclear. Keep practicing and refining your understanding of kanban.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at discussing the poor fit of scrum/sprint for certain functions, but could be more specific and clear in your explanations. Keep practicing and refining your arguments.

5 pts: Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying the confirmation heuristic bias as a potential issue for Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition

Your definition of confirmation heuristic bias is a bit unclear and seems to be a mix of confirmation bias and heuristics. Please review the concept and provide a clearer definition.

10 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail.

Comment: Good effort in explaining the concepts, but some details are missing. Keep up the good work and focus on providing more specific examples.

8 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail.

Good effort in addressing the prompts, but some details and clarity could be improved. Keep up the good work!
